overview_of_class: This course will explore the intermediate level of the Lester Horton Technique. We will focus on balance, stamina, movement quality, flexibility, technical skills, coordination, and dynamics. Students will gain a deeper understanding of the Horton Technique and progress their development as an artist.
name: Modern II
title: SoC DANCE 250-0-20 Modern II
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Reserved for Dance and Theater Majors and Minors & Music Theatre Certificate Students
